effect.sun-moon: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.

short_effect.sun-moon: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.
